entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
